title: Duke Nukem: Time to Kill playthrough -- Part 1
description: Decided to play this game today because I actually lost my save file for Zero Hour unfortunately. I'm still going to play through that game too, but I decided to just get up the point where I was at in Zero Hour off stream, and play this today. Sorry this playthrough sucks balls and I'm horrible at the game, but I'm having fun with it. This game is basically Tomb Raider so that's cool.
